entry.title: $2452 // Building includes co-working space with ♣ ♣ conference rooms, gym
entry.content:
text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID#21534 from this ad.

1 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Morgan Av, Flushing Av. Introducing 115 Stanwix, your sanctuary away from the day to day grind. Designed to allow you to focus on living your life with a home automation system, you can preprogram temperatures based on the time and day of the week. Turn the lights off and adjusting the thermostat sitting on on your couch or laying in bed. Building includes co-working space with conference rooms, gym, library, screening room a ground floor mail room, indoor lounge, Banquette lounge, Rooftop lounge and garden.

entry.content:
text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID#22497 from this ad.

1 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Halsey St. Introducing The Alhambra Luxury Lofts in Bushwick. These fully renovated lofts feature floor to ceiling windows, 16+ ft ceilings, extra large bedrooms, integrated lighting, hardwood floors and unique layouts. The Alhambra is just steps away from the L train at Halsey and a short walk from the J and M trains. Neighborhood favorites such as Nowadays, Father Knows best, Caffeine underground and houdini kitchen
